results.title: Loft Salon
results.content: #### TRAINING WITH A WORLD CHAMPION. #### STYLISTS. AAT THE LOFT SALON, OUR STYLISTS COMBINE CREATIVITY WITH INDUSTRY KNOWLEDGE TO PROVIDE YOU WITH BEAUTIFUL, CUTTING EDGE HAIR STYLING AND COLORING. ### STYLISTS. My passion for hair came 15 years ago when I decided to open my own salon. I have the pleasure of watching talented stylists make their clients feel beautiful everyday. While industry knowledge helps me assist you at the front desk, my years of helping make clients feel great is what I love to do. I am always excited to create a new look. I am educated in all the latest trends including balayage, baby lights and ombre'. As a stylist for over 20 years my passion for cutting hair has only gotten stronger. I have been in this great industry for over 25 years. I have training in Wella, Loreal and Bumble and Bumble. I understand the desires of my clients and love to create custom looks.
